A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Full of plot holes\, bad acting and really long. Visually stunning\, its one of the best shot movies Iv seen but that alone doesn't make up for butchering one of the worlds most beloved stories. No respect for the ethos of star wars and no respect for the characters who are just unceremoniously killed off. Also I think they are trying to push a far left political agenda. Overall I am in mourning. So many missed opportunities.
